mapper.insert: insert into membership(mId, pwd, mName, birth, phone, email, address, mDate, gender) values(#{mId}, #{pwd}, #{mName}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, sysdate, #{gender})
insert into sb_client(id, pwd, pl_serial) values (#{ID}, #{pwd}, pl_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select count(mId) from membership where mId = #{value}
select count(mId) from membership where mId = #{value}
select pwd from membership where mId = #{value}
select membership from sb_client where id = #{_parameter}
